name: Scrambled Pancakes
directions: Whisk eggs in a bowl, then add milk, vanilla, and melted butter.
In another bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and sugar.
Pour wet mixture into dry and whisk gently until combined; let rest 5 minutes.
Heat a greased nonstick pan over medium-high heat (300–350°F).
Pour about 1/2 cup batter into the pan and cook 30–60 seconds until a light crust forms.
Fold the pancake with a spatula, then chop and scramble the pieces until cooked through.
Repeat with remaining batter, keeping cooked pieces warm.
Serve warm with powdered sugar, maple syrup, or fruit sauce.
